name: Candy Quota: Halloween Harvest
description:
Candy Quota is a passive multiplayer game about working together in an unstable world that only exists during one month of the year: October. Each player works together by harvesting candies that are used to power a strange machine that raises a massive ladder into the sky. Each players contributions are shared with all players in the world, so that together we can raise the ladder to see what exists above.

How to Play

Collect the candies that spawn throughout the level and then feed them to the blue machine. The ladder in the center of the level will raise every time 50 candies are fed to the machine globally.

You can turn on the red control panel to see statistics such as:

  • The total number of players currently playing.
  • A count of all candies fed to the machine globally.
  • A total of your personal contributions to the global count.

Work together with all of the other players to harvest enough candy to completely raise the ladder before October ends.

At the strike of midnight on November 1st, the world will disappear until next October!

Controls
  • Move: D-Pad, Left Stick, WASD, or Arrow Keys
  • Jump: X (PS), A (XB), or Spacebar
  • Interact: Square (PS), X (XB), or E
